plays.text: Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 2 minutes for Slashing GLEN MURRAY
Penalty to GLEN MURRAY 2 minutes for Tripping Magnus Arvedson
Penalty to Marian Hossa 2 minutes for Holding P.J. Axelsson
Penalty to Ricard Persson 2 minutes for High Sticking Bill Guerin
Goal scored by Bill Guerin assisted by Jozef Stumpel and Scott Pellerin
Penalty to Glen Murray 2 minutes for Roughing Daniel Alfredsson
Penalty to Glen Murray 2 minutes for Interference Mike Fisher
Penalty to Mike Fisher 2 minutes for Elbowing Glen Murray
Goal scored by Radek Bonk assisted by Shawn McEachern and Marian Hossa
Goal scored by Zdeno Chara assisted by Radek Bonk and Wade Redden
